outputs.output_descr: The Project aims to develop national capacity for formulating and implementing international integration policies that best serve Viet Nam's development needs and the targets of the Socio-Economic Development Strategy 2011-2020. It focuses on achieving 3 outputs: (1) Enhanced capacity of Vietnamese leaders for defining development strategies and policy options in international integration; (2) More evidence-based international integration policies through policy research and dialogues; and (3) Other capacity building initiatives, including international exchange and South-South collaboration.

project_descr: Capacity Enhancement for Intensive International Integration of Viet Nam towards 2020
